main.description: A declaration of a site for an organization, with optional environmental and location context

lat.description: The latitude of the centerpoint of the site

lon.description: The longitude of the centerpoint of the site

area.description: The area of the site in hectares

shapefile.description: A blob pointing to a GeoJSON file containing the site boundaries

createdAt.description: The date and time of the creation of the record

country.description: The country where the site is located

stateProvince.description: The first-level administrative division (state, province, region) where the site is located

locality.description: Specific locality description for the site

minimumElevationInMeters.description: The lower elevation bound of the site in meters

maximumElevationInMeters.description: The upper elevation bound of the site in meters

biome.description: The biome classification of the site

ecosystemType.description: Freeform description of the ecosystem type at the site

protectionStatus.description: The protection status of the site

iucnProtectedAreaCategory.description: The IUCN protected area management category

wdpaId.description: The World Database on Protected Areas (WDPA) identifier for the site

averageAnnualRainfallMm.description: The average annual rainfall at the site in millimeters

averageTemperatureCelsius.description: The average annual temperature at the site in degrees Celsius

climatezone.description: The Koppen climate classification for the site

monitoringStartDate.description: The date and time when monitoring of the site began

description.description: A rich text description of the site

boundary.description: URL to a boundary GeoJSON file (alternative to the shapefile blob)

siteRemarks.description: Additional notes or remarks about the site
